articles.title: Biden tests negative for Covid after 'rebound' case - doctor
articles.description: The US president will stay in isolation until he has a second negative test, his doctor says.
articles.content:
US President Joe Biden has tested negative for Covid-19 days after getting a second bout of the virus, his doctor says.
Mr Biden, 76, first tested positive for the virus more than two weeks ago.

articles.title: Lightning strike causes major fire at Cuban fuel depot
articles.description: Dozens are injured and 17 firefighters are missing as the battle continues to get the fire under control.
